title: Missions for Skins
body: I have only received one mission for one skin, but I have 10 runepages which should warrant me with at least 2 if I understand that correctly ?

replies.body: It will depend on how the rune pages were purchased.  Those unlocked with IP go towards your BE capsule, while RP purchased pages go towards a skin.  Looking into this for you, your account was eligible for one skin.  I hope that helps!
